text: Ara yakhana tomara striderake talaka diye da'o ebam tarapara tara'o nirdharita iddata purna karate thake, takhana taderake purba sbamidera sathe parasparika sam'matira bhittite niyamanuyayi biye karate badhadana karo na. E upadesa take'i deya hacche, ye allaha o keyamata dinera upara bisbasa sthapana kareche. Era madhye tomadera jan'ya rayeche ekanta parisud'dhata o aneka pabitrata. Ara allaha janena, tomara jana na.
